issue.title: Make it easier to delete multi-pills

content.raw:
Is there a way to easily select the outer-most container? 

I tried setting the border of the mainFrame to "selected", but then every child variable pill and the `Variable:` label text get "selected". The only solution I can think of is to programmaticaly select every child (this triggers the `UpdateStyleSheet()` function) and revert the selected border.
